member.name: T:FuseBox.Container
member.summary: Fuse is a very simple IoC container that should be used to wire-up applications in a loosely coupled way.

member.name: F:FuseBox.Container.NoSuitableConstructor
member.summary: Message when there isn't a suitable constructor.

member.name: F:FuseBox.Container._isResolving
member.summary: Tells if a certain type is currently being resolved.

member.name: M:FuseBox.Container.Resolve(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves an instance for the given type.
member.returns: A instance that is assignable to .

member.name: T:FuseBox.CyclicDependencyException
member.summary: Exception thrown when can't resolve a type because it's dependency graph contains a cycle.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type where the cycle was identified.

member.name: P:FuseBox.CyclicDependencyException.Type
member.summary: Gets the type where the cycle was identified.

member.name: T:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException
member.summary: Exception throw when a certain type couldn't be resolved by .

member.name: M:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type that couldn't be resolved.

member.name: M:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException.#ctor(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type that couldn't be resolved.
The reason why the type couldn't be resolved.

member.name: M:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException.#ctor(System.Type,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The exception that caused this exception.

member.name: M:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or System.Exception.HResult is zero (0).

member.name: P:FuseBox.UnresolvableTypeException.Type
member.summary: Gets the type that couldn't be resolved.
